workflows.description: Investigate Login Failures and also identify other impacted assets

resource.content: Approval to block IP Address {{vars.input.records[0].sourceIp}} was denied.
Source IP: {{vars.source_ip}} is found to be safe.

schema.title: Proceed With Blocking Of IP
schema.description: Block action recommend for - {{vars.input.records[0].sourceIp}}. Please confirm to initiate action.

resource.content: VirusTotal Reports {{vars.source_ip}}  to be  Malicious with an aggregated score of  {{vars.steps.Get_Source_IP_Reputation.data.aggregate}}

arguments.inputActionReasons: Blocking Initiated as part of BFA remediation process. Please refer Alert# {{vars.input.records[0].id}}

resource.content: Source IP: {{vars.source_ip}} is Internal and therfore benign
Source IP {{vars.source_ip}} is External

steps.name: Match Source IP in Internal CIDR

routes.name: Is Source IP internal -> Copy  of Create Note for Internal IP
routes.label: External

routes.name: Update Severity to Critical -> Block External IP
Is Source IP internal -> Copy 1 of Create Note for Safe IP
routes.label: Internal

routes.name: Create Note for Malicious IP -> Update Severity to High
Block External IP -> Create Note Not Blocking IP
routes.label: No

routes.name: Configuration -> Start Investigation
Start -> Attacker Metadata
Match Source IP in Internal CIDR -> Is Source IP internal
Block External IP -> Get Indicator Detail
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Start Investigation -> Match Source IP in Internal CIDR
Get Indicator Detail -> Block Indicator
Is Malicious IP -> Create Note for Safe IP
routes.label: Safe

routes.name: Create Note for External IP -> Get Source IP Reputation
Is Malicious IP -> Create Note for Malicious IP
routes.label: Malicious

routes.name: Get Source IP Reputation -> Is Malicious IP

message.content: {{vars.indicatorValue}} has been **Blocked** as confirmed by {{vars.loggedInUserName}}

resource.content: {{vars.loggedInUserName}} initiated block of {{vars.indicatorValue}} with the following reasons: {{vars.actionReason}}

schema.title: ⚠️ Block {{vars.indicatorValue}}
schema.description:
Configure your firewall to block {{vars.indicatorValue}} and Click "**Block Completed**" to confirm the status.

*Consider changing this step to automation using a connector. That would accelerate your response time and allow you to focus on advanced threats.*

routes.name: Add note to Indicator -> Manual Task to Block
Manual Task to Block -> Mark as Blocked
routes.label: Block Completed

routes.name: Start -> Configuration
Manual Task to Block -> Mark as TBD
routes.label: Unable to Block

routes.name: Configuration -> Add note to Indicator

connectors.name: virustotal
connectors.label: VirusTotal
connectors.description: VirusTotal provides a service that analyzes suspicious files and URLs and facilitates the quick detection of viruses, worms, trojans, and all kinds of malware. This connector facilitates automated operations such as scanning and analyzing suspicious files and URLs and retrieving reports from VirusTotal for files, IP addresses, and domains.
